org.anddev.andengine.util
Class Transformation

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.util.Transformation

public class Transformation
extends Object

This class is basically a java-space replacement for the native Matrix class.

Math taken from senocular.com.

This class represents an affine transformation with the following matrix: 
 [ a , b , 0 ]
 [ c , d , 0 ]
 [ tx, ty, 1 ]
where:
  • a is the x scale
  • b is the y skew
  • c is the x skew
  • d is the y scale
  • tx is the x translation
  • ty is the y translation

(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.

Since:
15:47:18 - 23.12.2010

Nicolas Gramlich
